label: 好色一代女
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
見出し読み: こうしょくいちだいおんな
見出し読み_mod: こうしょくいちだいおんな
説明文: (By Ihara Saikaku, 1686) [Book in form of] the confession of an old crone who reviews a life of lovemaking, first as a girl at court, then as concubine to a daimyo, later as a tayū, and eventually as an ever-descending prostitute who ends her days as a streetwalker (p. 762). [井原西鶴、大名、太夫]
